data.title: Films with screenplays by Steven E. de Souza
data.text:
1.

The Flintstones

1994 US comedy film directed by Brian Levant

Overview: The Flintstones (also known as The Flintstones Movie or The Flintstones: The Live-Action Movie in the working title) is a 1994 American comedy film directed by Brian Levant and written by Tom S. Parker ...

Release date: 23 May 1994

Genre: Comedy, Crime, Family, Fantasy

Director: Brian Levant

In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy ...

0 0

2.

Ricochet

1991 film directed by Russell Mulcahy

Overview: Ricochet is a 1991 American action crime thriller film, directed by Russell Mulcahy, written by Steven E. de Souza, and starring Denzel Washington, John Lithgow, Ice-T, Kevin Pollak, and Lindsay Wagner ...

Release date: 4 October 1991

Genre: Action, Crime, Thriller

Director: Russell Mulcahy

A District Attorney is terrorized by the criminal he put away years ago when he was a cop.

0 0

3.

Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life

2003 action-adventure film by Jan de Bont

Overview: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider – The Cradle of Life is a 2003 action adventure film directed by Jan de Bont and based on the Tomb Raider video game series. Angelina Jolie stars as the titular character Lara Croft ...

Release date: 21 July 2003

Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Thriller

Adventuress Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box before an evil scientist and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to ...

0 0

4.

Commando

1985 film by Mark L. Lester

Overview: Commando is a 1985 American action film directed by Mark L. Lester and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Alyssa Milano, Vernon Wells, Bill Duke and Dan Hedaya. The film was released in the ...

Release date: 4 October 1985

Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Thriller

A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

0 0

5.

The Running Man

1987 dystopian action film by Paul Michael Glaser

Overview: The Running Man is a 1987 American dystopian action film directed by Paul Michael Glaser and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, María Conchita Alonso, Richard Dawson, Yaphet Kotto, and Jesse Ventura. It is ...

Release date: 13 November 1987

Genre: Action, Sci-Fi, Thriller

In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners ...

0 0

6.

Street Fighter

1994 action film, based on the video game series

Overview: Street Fighter is a 1994 action film written and directed by Steven E. de Souza, based on the video game series of the same name produced by Capcom. It was one of two films released in 1994 specifically ...

Release date: 23 December 1994

Genre: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller, Comedy

Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

0 0

7.

Judge Dredd

1995 US science fiction-action film directed by Danny Cannon

Overview: Judge Dredd is a 1995 American science fiction action film based on the 2000 AD comics character of the same name. It is directed by Danny Cannon and stars Sylvester Stallone in the title role, a law ...

Release date: 30 June 1995

Genre: Action, Crime, Sci-Fi, Thriller

Director: Danny Cannon

In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not ...

0 0

8.

Die Hard 2

1990 film by Renny Harlin

Overview: Die Hard 2 is a 1990 American action-thriller film and the second installment in the Die Hard film series. The film was released on June 29, 1990 in the United States. The film was directed by Renny Harlin ...

Release date: 2 July 1990

Genre: Action, Thriller

Director: Renny Harlin

John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

0 0

9.

Die Hard

1988 American action film directed by John McTiernan

Overview: Die Hard is a 1988 American action film directed by John McTiernan and written by Jeb Stuart and Steven E. de Souza. It stars Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Alexander Godunov, and Bonnie Bedelia. Based on ...

Release date: 15 July 1988

Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller

Director: John McTiernan

An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles ...

0 0

10.

Beverly Hills Cop III

1994 American action comedy film directed by John Landis

Overview: Beverly Hills Cop III is a 1994 American action comedy film starring Eddie Murphy and directed by John Landis, who had previously worked with Murphy on Trading Places and Coming to America. It is the third ...

Release date: 25 May 1994

Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Thriller

Director: John Landis

Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit ...

0 0

11.

48 Hrs.

1982 buddy cop film by Walter Hill

Overview: 48 Hrs. is a 1982 American buddy cop action comedy film directed by Walter Hill. It is Joel Silver's first film as a film producer. The screenplay was written by Hill, Roger Spottiswoode, Larry Gross and ...

Release date: 8 December 1982

Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Thriller

Director: Walter Hill

A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.

0 0

13.

The Return of Captain Invincible

1983 Australian film

Overview: The Return of Captain Invincible is a 1983 Australian musical comedy superhero film starring Alan Arkin and Christopher Lee. It was a box office disappointment on release but has become a cult film since ...

Release date: 17 February 1984

Genre: Sci-Fi, Musical, Fantasy, Comedy

Director: Philippe Mora

In WWII, Captain Invincible used his superpowers against the Nazis, and he was a hero. But when they accused him of supporting the communists...

0 0

15.

Blast

2004 film by Anthony Hickox

Overview: Blast is a 2004 action film directed by Anthony Hickox and starring Eddie Griffin, Vinnie Jones, Breckin Meyer, and Vivica A. Fox. It was written by Steven E. de Souza.

0 0

17.

Possessed

2000 American horror film

Overview: Possessed is a 2000 American made-for-television horror film directed by Steven E. de Souza, written by de Souza and Michael Lazarou, and starring Timothy Dalton. The film is based on events appearing ...

0 0

18.

K-9000

1991 American science fiction crime action television film

Overview: K-9000 is a 1991 sci-fi crime TV movie starring Chris Mulkey, Catherine Oxenberg, Dennis Haysbert, and Judson Scott. It was directed by Kim Manners and written by Michael Part and Steven E. de Souza. The ...

0 0
